description: A Flutter signup screen widget implementing user registration UI with form validation, Google sign-in, and navigation, styled to match specific design guidelines.

classes.name: SignupScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the user signup interface.

classes.name: _SignupScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the signup form state, including input controllers, validation, and UI interactions.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of the text editing controllers when the widget is removed from the widget tree.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Handles form validation, simulates account creation, displays feedback, and navigates back to the home route.

methods.name: _signupGoogle
methods.description: Triggers Google sign-in action (currently mocked with a snack bar).

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the entire UI of the signup screen, including form fields, buttons, and background decoration.

methods.name: _heroBackground
methods.description: Creates a gradient background widget for the signup screen.
